post.body: blessings to you today. Your profile is amazing! Best of luck with your endeavors. Enjoy a beautiful day! :)
my oracle cards say expansion and abundance coming with a move. Best of luck!
good luck on your book venture. no running out of steam! End of the book is hardest to do. Focus on summarizing its purpose.
When you find yourself feeling frustrated, remember compassion. The feeling of compassion is effective for clearing off negativity quickly.
Trust that little voice in your head that says "Wouldn't it be interesting if..."; And then do it. - Duane Michals
"Money will buy you a fine dog, but only love can make it wag its tail" Richard Friedman ~
Make your decisions great, and in harmony to everyday life. - Violet-Aura.com
Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom. Marcel Proust
To go beyond yourself, you must first know yourself. -Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj
"Everybody feels lucky for having you as a friend." -unknown
When a woman tells the truth she is creating the possibility for more truth around her. --Adrienne Rich
"Step out of your routine and notice what's truly occurring around you. Awaken your potential and power -move, shake, and take action!"
"Enjoy yourself. Make pampering yourself a priority, and you'll have all the energy you need to create everything you desire." -D. Linn
Published article on the web! Thanks for looking: http://tinyurl.com/auraproof
I am grateful for this gorgeous day today!
"What you see is not all that you get" --unknown
I recently published: http://tinyurl.com/violet-new
"There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will." - Epictetus
Trust in the brilliant ideas you receive from the Divine source and make your move to manifest them!
New moon - A time to go inward. In silence you find your sacred truths. Be with this and emerge brightly out of the dark, as the moon does.
